comments.body: Not sure if this should have changed
Actually this was typo. This plugin was added in 2.7 version and not in 2.6

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@    plugin_type: inventory
    short_description: VMware Guest inventory source
    version_added: "2.7"
    author:
      - Abhijeet Kasurde (@Akasurde)

comments.body:
tags?

Does it make sense to have a default list of properties?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +67,71 @@            - Each value in the list specifies the path to a specific property in VM object.
            type: list
            default: [ 'name', 'config.cpuHotAddEnabled', 'config.cpuHotRemoveEnabled',
                       'config.instanceUuid', 'config.hardware.numCPU', 'config.template',
                       'config.name', 'guest.hostName', 'guest.ipAddress',
